name: Find the optimal itinerary between stations on the same line
id: stories/find_next_train_departures.story;Find the optimal itinerary between stations on the same line

testSteps.description: Given {Western} line trains from {Emu Plains} leave {Parramatta} for {Town Hall} at {07:58, 08:00, 08:02, 08:11, 08:14, 08:21}
When I want to travel from {Parramatta} to {Town Hall} at {08:00}
Then I should be told about the trains at: {08:02, 08:11, 08:14}

userStory.narrative:
In order to plan my trips more effectively
As a commuter
I want to know the next trains going to my destination

title: Find the optimal itinerary between stations on the same line

tags.name: Find out what time the next trains for my destination station leave
tags.displayName: Find out what time the next trains for my destination station leave
